pages.text:
About Golf Metrics
Your Private Golf Studio
FOR GOLFERS WHO LOVE BEING GOLFERS:
We know that rain or shine you need the very best practice facility available.
Now you have one!
Our purpose is to provide you with the perfect golf learning environment using the very best golf technology available.
Our large private indoor Trackman golf simulator bay with V1 Pressure Mat and high-definition slow motion camera technology combined with a Perfect Putting Platform we provide you the very best private golf improvement environment possible.
Golf Metrics provides you with a private golf studio owned and operated by South Florida PGA Golf Professionals who look forward to sharing their passion and talents with you.
Do you want to know why your golf ball does what it does?
Are you tired of practicing golf in the heat, cold or rain?
Not enough sunlight in the day?
Do you know how far you carry or hit a golf ball when you practice?
Would you like to be custom fit for a golf clubs that can work for you?
Try our easy online booking system.
If you would rather connect on a phone call to discuss your golfing goals, you may reach us at 239-470-3677. We also respond to text messages!
click to book online
OUR MOST RECENT VIDEO
What's a playing lesson?
Practice happens on the driving range, golf is played on the course. In order to improve your game, we must identify the skills required to achieve lower scores. We must play the game.
Questions? Get in Touch
Private Coaching
Contact us about custom private coaching for players at all levels and ages. We build a bespoke curriculum for all students.
On-course Lessons
Ask us about playing lessons. For players that desire to receive instruction that translates to the course and realities of the game, that instruction must happen on the course.
Youth Golfer Training
Many young athletes have the physical talent to hit the ball with power and finesse shape into each shot, and our youth program helps young students focus their game to play at the high school and collegiate levels.

About Golf Metrics
Southwest Florida’s premier golf coaching program. Helping avid golfers reach their goals while having a lot of fun throughout the process. We provide an air-conditioned indoor golf studio featuring a launch monitor and putting analyzer, as well as on-the-course coaching for all other elements of the game.
Contact Info
[email protected]
(239) 470-3677
10970 S Cleveland Ave. Bldg. 603 Fort Myers, FL 33907
Hours of Operation

By appointment only
